name: MltisafeMultiSafepay

infos.name: MultiSafepay Online-Bezahlung (Gratis plugin mit +20 Bezahlmethoden)
infos.description:
MultiSafepay bietet ein im eigenen Haus entwickeltes offizielles Shopware-Plugin, das zum ersten Mal im Oktober 2019 veröffentlicht wurde. Für die vollständige Dokumentation bitte auf unsere entspreche Seite Shopware 6 Bezug nehmen.

MultiSafepay bietet eine Vielzahl von Zahlungsverfahren, einschließlich:

  • iDEAL und iDEAL QR,
  • Bancontact und Bancontact QR,
  • Apple Pay,
  • Direct Bank Transfer,
  • Visa, Mastercard, American Express, 
  • CartaSi, Cartes Bancaires, Dankort, Postepay, 
  • PayPal, 
  • SOFORT Banking, 
  • Giropay,
  • EPS, 
  • SEPA Bank Transfer und SEPA Direct Debit, 
  • ING Home'Pay,
  • KBC/CBC Payment Button, 
  • Belfius, 
  • paysafecard, 
  • Trustly, 
  • Dotpay, 
  • Santander Betaalplan, 
  • Klarna, 
  • Afterpay, 
  • Pay After Delivery, 
  • Gift Cards via Intersolve, 123TCS und Giftcards wie VVV Giftcard, Fashioncheque oder Ihre eigene Gift Card.

MultiSafepay ist mit einer Erfahrung von mehr als 20 Jahren einer der führenden Online Payment Service Provider auf dem europäischen Markt. Wir bieten verständliche Zahlungsdienstleistungen für Online-Shops und wir sind stolz auf unsere im eigenen Haus entwickelten Plugins und Features. Als ein Technologie-Unternehmen mit Herz glauben wir fest an Innovation und neue Technologien, um Lösungen auf dem Stand der Technik zu liefern, die den Händlern helfen, auf dem Hochgeschwindigkeitsmarkt der Finanz und Technologie zu wachsen. Wir rühmen uns, einfache und dennoch leistungsstarke Lösungen für eine Vielzahl von verschiedenen Händler zu entwickeln. MultiSafepay kontrolliert den End-to-End-Zahlungsfluss von zehntausenden von Händlern in ganz Europa und baut seinen Geschäftsbereich ständig weiter aus. 

Bitte wenden Sie sich an unser Integration Team unter integration@multisafepay.com, falls Sie Fragen haben.
infos.shortDescription: MultiSafepay ist ein Collecting Payment Service Provider. Das bedeutet, wir kümmern uns um alle Verträge, die technischen Details und die notwendigen Abrechnung für alle Bezahlmethoden.

infos.name: MultiSafepay online payments for Shopware (iDEAL, Cards, Klarna, Alipay etc.)
infos.description:
MultiSafepay offers an in-house developed official Shopware plugin, first released in October 2019. For the full documentation, please refer please refer to our Shopware Docs page.

MultiSafepay offers a wide range of payment methods, including: 

Credit cards:

  • American Express
  • Mastercard
  • Visa
  • Postepay
  • Cartes Bancaires
  • Dankort
  • V Pay

Direct banking:

  • ​iDEAL and iDEAL QR,
  • Bancontact and Bancontact QR, 
  • Direct Bank Transfer,
  • MyBank
  • Trustly
  • SEPA Direct
  • KBC/CBC
  • Belfius
  • EPS
  • Dotpay
  • Giropay
  • TrustPay
  • Bizum
  • Over 20 different prepaid cards

Digital wallets:

  • Alipay
  • Amazon Pay
  • Apple Pay
  • Google Pay
  • PayPal
  • WeChat Pay

Buy Now, Pay Later:

  • Pay in Installments
  • Pay After Delivery
  • in3
  • Riverty
  • E-invoicing
  • Klarna
  • Betaal per Maand

Through our Payment Components, you can easily offer a smooth and frictionless payment experience.

MultiSafepay is a leading end-to-end processing and acquirer payment platform for European merchants, providing frictionless online, in-person, and omnichannel payment solutions. The Netherlands-based payment provider's cutting-edge, in-house developed technology facilitates businesses of all sizes to focus on growth and innovation and serves over 20,000 European companies through a single platform and integration. 
As an acquirer for the major card schemes and provider of more than 40 global and local payment methods across 35 integrations, MultiSafepay offers merchants the flexibility and convenience of advanced omnichannel technology for a wide range of markets. MultiSafepay is committed to empowering businesses with full-service solutions. As pioneers since 1999, their mission to this day remains to build world-class payment solutions for merchants to optimize payment success and provide dedicated customer service that enables merchants across Europe to thrive.
infos.shortDescription: MultiSafepay is a collecting payment service provider, which means we take care of the agreements, technical details, and payment collection required for each payment method.
infos.highlights:
MultiSafepay is an end-to-end, true omnichannel payment provider
As acquirer and processor, credit card transactions through MultiSafepay run through the best network possible
Always speak to someone in your language through the dedicated customer support team, available in over 6 languages
The in-house development team means you're always receiving updates to integrate the latest features
Use the various plugins and automations to streamline your business and financial administration
infos.features:
Easy recurring payments 
Full and partial refunds for non-Buy Now, Pay Later methods
Use our Payment Components to create a seamless payment experience and shift PCI-DSS compliance to us

priceModels.bookingText: MultiSafepay online payments for Shopware (iDEAL, Cards, Klarna, Alipay etc.)

comments.text: Very nice plugin for your payments.
comments.headline: Very good plugin

changelog.text:
Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-323: Fix strict typing issue on Shopware 6.4.17
  • PLGSHPS6-322: Fix notification not working on 6.4


Changed

  • DAVAMS-618: Rename credit card to Card payment

Added

  • PLGSHPS6-318: Add compatibility for shopware 6.5
  • PLGSHPS6-294: Add Google Pay redirect
  • PLGSHPS6-308: Add image update while updating the plugin
  • DAVAMS-563: Add Pay After Delivery Installments payment method
  • PLGSHPS6-160: Add Dutch translations


Changed

  • DAVAMS-582: Update Pay After Delivery logo


Removed

  • PLGSHPS6-318: Remove compatibility for shopware 6.3
  • DAVAMS-565: Remove Google Analytics within the Order Request
  • PLGSHPS6-238: Remove payment method description

Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-305: Fix shipping request not working

Added

  • DAVAMS-488: Add MyBank payment method
  • DAVAMS-520 Add Amazon Pay payment method


Changed

  • DAVAMS-546: Rebrand Afterpay to Riverty

Added

  • PLGSHPS6-295: Add WeChat Pay


Changed

  • PLGSHPS6-243: Change payment method in notification when the customer changes the payment method on the payment page outside shopware


Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-301: Fix dead links that redirect to MultiSafepay docs
  • PLGSHPS6-297: Fix state data missing from order request
  • PLGSHPS6-292: Only show Apple Pay in Shopware 6.4 when it should
  • Fix User-Agent and HTTP Referer being mandatory in the order request

Added

  • DAVAMS-479: Add Alipay+
  • PLGSHPS6-194: Add payment component in credit cards gateways

Changed
  • PLGSHPS6-291: Update MultiSafepay plugin icon
  • PLGSHPS6-194: Tokenization setting field has been moved to the gateway level. Make sure to re-enable Tokenization again### Changed
PLGSHPS6-280: Fix sales channel API button not working on versions between 6.4.0 and 6.4.9

Added

* PLGSHPS6-272: Add 2 more generic gateways


Changed

* PLGSHPS6-260: Use billing and shipping address from order instead of default address


Fixed

* PLGSHPS6-270: Fix issue releated with access private properties of the token object

* PLGSHPS6-279: Fix validate API key button not working on Shopware version 6.4.9.0

Added

  • PLGSHPS6-266: Add Google Analytics support


Changed

  • PLGSHPS6-261: Disable ING Home'Pay on update


Fixed

  • Do not update name and description of generic gateways 2 and 3 on update
  • Update all links to MultiSafepay Docs
  • PLGSHPS6-267: Fix shipping request not working
  • Fix error on 6.3 with the status open - initialized


Deprecated

  • Deprecate all ING Home'Pay classes

Added

  • PLGSHPS6-259: Add 2 more generic gateways


Fixed

  • Generic gateway not working when using multiple sales channels
  • PLGSHPS6-258: Fix issue with repeatedly updating order status

Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-251: iDEAL issuer input not working
  • PLGSHPS6-256: Fix 500 error on empty POST notification
  • PLGSHPS6-253: Resolve conflict Shopware 6.4 and Guzzle6 adapter

Fixed

  • Fix iDEAL issuer dropdown not working on checkout page

Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-230: Fix get correct locale for payment page
  • PLGSHPS6-236: Use global Shopware object directly in javascript

Changed

  • PLGSHPS6-229: Increase payment token lifetime according to second chance lifetime
  • DAVAMS-414: Use post notifications

Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-227: Fix support for custom products with sub options

Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-198: Send invoice id to MultiSafepay when an invoice has been created

Fixed

  • Fix missing null check with tokenization and logged-in user

Added

  • Add support for Shopware 6.4


Fixed

  • Fix import for in3 for refunds

Added

  • Add support for PHP 8


Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-190: Fix support for custom line items
  • Fix ESLint errors when running watch-administration.sh, thanks to JoshuaBehrens

Added

  • Add support for generic gateway, see Generic Gateway FAQ


Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-179: Fix API key validation on Shopware versions later than 6.3.4
  • PLGSHPS6-176: Prevent multiple paid notices by not performing status changes on success page


Changed

  • PLGSHPS6-181: Change how bundled items are added to the shopping cart
  • DAVAMS-350: Update Trustly payment method logo

Added

  • DAVAMS-241: Add in3
  • PLGSHPS6-172: Add Good4fun Giftcard
  • Add support tab
  • PLGSHPS6-166: Add seconds active support


Changed

  • DAVAMS-302: Rebrand Direct Bank Transfer to Request to Pay
  • DAVAMS-319: Rebrand Klarna to Klarna - buy now, pay later

Added

  • PLGSHPS6-162: Add API check button in backend


Changed

  • PLGSHPS6-164: Allow payment change after checkout enabled by default

Added

  • Add support for Shopware 6.3


Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-158: Fix creditcard checkout error with multilanguage store


Changed

  • PLGSHPS6-143: Use ACTION_PAID instead of deprecated ACTION_PAY


Removed

  • Drop support for Shopware 6.1

Fixed

  • Fix incorrect tax when tax free is used
  • PLGSHPS6-155: Fix incorrect tax if tax display is set to net

Added

  • DAVAMS-275: Add CBC payment method


Fixed

  • Fix customized products being included twice in shopping cart
  • PLGSHPS6-154: Fix getActiveTokenField error on backend order


Changed

  • PLGSHPS6-144: Set max amount dynamically for refunds
  • PLGSHPS6-148: Add tooltips for tokenization

Added
  • PLGSHPS6-51: Add Tokenization for Visa, Mastercard and Maestro.

Changed
  • PLGSHPS6-145: Replace refund confirm dialog with modal.

Added

  • PLGSHPS6-51: Add full and partial refund support for non billing suite payment methods


Changed

  • DAVAMS-227: Rename Santander Betaalplan to Santander Betaal per Maand
  • PLGSHPS6-140: Set payment method default active on update

Added

  • PLGSHPS6-135: Add Apple Pay
  • PLGSHPS6-134: Add Direct Bank Transfer
  • PLGSHPS6-136: Add update function

Fixed

  • PLGSHPS6-130: Fix support for different sales channels

Added

  • PLGSHPS6-52: Add support for shipment updates
  • PLGSHPS6-98: Add plugin information to transaction request

Fixed

  • Fix support for Shopware 6.1 RC3

Version 1.0.0

Added

  • Add support for separate gateways for all payment methods and gift cards
  • PLGSHPS6-112: Add German translations for settings
  • PLGSHPS6-111: Add German translation for MultiSafepay plugin title
  • PLGSHPS6-84: Add order-status update when notification-url is triggered

Changed

  • PLGSHPS6-121: Get name from Address object instead of Customer object
  • Change technical plugin name

Added

  • PLGSHPS6-4: Add MultiSafepay payment method.
